description:
A girl who works at a grocery in the city of Chryse. By delivering food to CGS, she has become friends with the CGS boys. In particular, she has slight crush on Mikazuki.
2nd season:Tekkadan`s head cook. Now that Tekkadan has a good cash flow, she can purchase new ingredients that she was previously never able to buy, and she invents new menu items on a daily basis. She remains as fond of Mikazuki as ever.
Source: en.gundam.info
name: Atra Mixta
